### Stories of Environmental Change on Cape Cod

The following stories were produced by the Fall 2019 [SEA Semester](https://www.sea.edu) program, Climate and Society. Student teams had just 6 weeks to report on a local environmentak project on Cape Cod. [Read more...](../about/)
